description: Trail starts at 1200m. Trail has a steady climb to km 3.3 at 1835 m. Then the trail will drop to 1770m, then climb to the summit of 2000m in 1.2 km. There are great views of the smokey river valley also great views of other peaks like Mount Hammel. On a clear day you can see Mount Robson.
directions: Trailhead starts just west of Grande Cache at the Cemetary entrance. You will see a sign for the trailhead.
title: Grande Mtn.
